CustomField.description: When Employees are Paid per Hour and the amount varies, this is the field for the explanation of why it varies. There is a separate field if the amount does not vary.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When Employees are Paid per Hour and the amount varies, this is the field for the explanation of why it varies. There is a separate field if the amount does not vary.
CustomField.label: When Hourly Amount of Pay Varies?
